thread.title: Milo Ventimiglia Knocked On A Random Fan's Door And It Was Perfect
thread.title_full: Milo Ventimiglia Knocked On A Random Fan's Door And It Was Perfect

author: Billy Lorusso
title: Milo Ventimiglia Knocked On A Random Fan's Door And It Was Perfect
text:
View this image ›
Alberto E. Rodriguez / Getty Images ID: 10490163 2. Last night, while filming scenes for the show on location in Los Angeles, the actor noticed that a nearby family was at home watching This Is Us , and he proceeded to do something really f*ckin’ cool: When your filming #ThisIsUs & the neighbors are watching...#ThisIsUs while you're filming #ThisIsUs!!! TONIGHT we'r… https://t.co/g6dP4r3bnh
— Milo Ventimiglia (@MiloVentimiglia) Twitter: @MiloVentimiglia ID: 10490211 3. That’s right, he did what any actor starring in a hit-television show would do: Rounded up the cast and crew and knocked on the fan’s door. View this image ›
Twitter: @MiloVentimiglia ID: 10490884 4. “We’re filming next door and we happened to notice what you’re watching right now…you’re watching us!” Milo said, before introducing himself and taking a selfie with the neighbor named Fred. View this image ›
Twitter: @MiloVentimiglia ID: 10490396 5. *adds “adorable appreciation for fans” to the list of reasons to love Milo Ventimiglia* View this image ›
Twitter: @MiloVentimiglia ID: 10491535 6. Thank you for being so perfect, Jack Pearson. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10490589
